text:
The AAPicks team writes about things we think you’ll like, and we may see a share of revenue from any purchases made through affiliate links. 

If you’re in the market for a portable speaker system, then Tech Deals has an offer going on that’s pretty hard to resist.
This offer only lasts for the next two days , but Tech Deals has informed us that they only have limited inventory , and since these have been flying off the shelves, they expect to sell out before then. The Boombotix Boombot Bass Station is a rugged, waterproof Bluetooth speaker with a 15W subwoofer dock that adds extra bass power, and for a limited time you can grab this puppy for just $27.95. 
Considering the retail price for this speaker is $150 , we’re thinking this is a pretty slick deal.
The Boombotix Boombot Bass Station is a fairly well reviewed product with most users complementing the sound quality and portability.
Most detractors pointed to the product’s relatively high price tag as their only complaint, but considering you’re buying this for 81% off , it seems like that point of friction has been eliminated.
